title: Kirk Franklin Interview and more
itunes:title: Kirk Franklin Interview and more
description:
Today on the show we had Kirk Franklin stop by where he spoke about the pandemic, suffering from trauma and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to LAPD chief Michael Moore for his comments about the protest and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee"

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
